name: DEEP (teamtoolazy)
description:
DEEP
Destroy Everlasting Emotional Potential

Use UP, DOWN, LEFT, RIGHT to move the selected henchalien, who is currently disguised as a cat.
Use E to interact with an object on the board (henchalien must be facing object, not in same tile).
Use P to pause the game.

Year 4XX4, 90% of Earth is underwater. 10% is held aloft in a giant city supported by structural beams powered quite literally by... LOVE! Love makes the world go 'round and all that. Of course this is the perfect opportunity for us aliens to destroy the city!

It's time to sabotage ALL ZE relationships! We'll leave behind some "presents" and deepen some misunderstandings. Like cats offering presents.

Cats are amazing.

But we don't want the humans getting too suspicious, so it's three (3) presents per household. But which three?

Pick wisely. Each relationship is unique and not all "presents" are treated equal.

Destroy relationships, ruin love, and shut down the city's power. Let's sink the human city~ MWAHAHAHAHAHAHA!

Credits:

DEEP: Destroy Everlasting Emotional Potential was brought to you by Team Too Lazy

Narrative Design Wizards: Doves In Dreams, Kyuui
Code Warlocks: Kyuui, Doves In Dreams
Player Icon: Kyuui
Music: "Break the Keys" by Manuel Senfft, used under CC BY-NC-SA 4.0 License. Please go check out more music from Manuel Senfft
Emoji Art: Flat Emoji 1.0 from JoyPixels

Made for Ludum Dare 48
